verses.text: Eliu \w also|strong="H3254"\w* proceeded, \w and|strong="H3254"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

Suffer \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w little|strong="H2191"\w*, \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5750"\w* shew thee: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* somewhat \w to|strong="H5750"\w* speak \w in|strong="H5750"\w* \w Godâ€™s|strong="H0433"\w* behalf.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* repeat \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1843"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* beginning, \w and|strong="H6664"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* prove \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6466"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lie|strong="H8267"\w*, \w and|strong="H5973"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1844"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* proved \w to|strong="H5973"\w* thee.

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* cast away \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w*, whereas \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w* \w also|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* saveth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* giveth \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H1639"\w* \w away|strong="H1639"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w from|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* placeth \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w exalted|strong="H1361"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0631"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3920"\w* be \w in|strong="H0631"\w* chains, \w and|strong="H0631"\w* be \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w with|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* of poverty:

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* shall shew \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* works, \w and|strong="H5046"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* wicked \w deeds|strong="H6467"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* been violent.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* shall \w open|strong="H1540"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* correct \w them|strong="H7725"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H0559"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w observe|strong="H5647"\w*, \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w accomplish|strong="H3615"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* glory.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* consumed \w in|strong="H8085"\w* folly.

Dissemblers \w and|strong="H0639"\w* crafty men prove \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w cry|strong="H7768"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0639"\w* \w bound|strong="H0631"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H4191"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H4191"\w* storm, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w their|strong="H4191"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* among \w the|strong="H4191"\w* effeminate.

He shall \w deliver|strong="H2502"\w* \w the|strong="H1540"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* out \w of|strong="H0241"\w* \w his|strong="H1540"\w* distress, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* shall \w open|strong="H1540"\w* \w his|strong="H1540"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w in|strong="H6041"\w* affliction.

Therefore \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w set|strong="H4390"\w* thee \w at|strong="H3808"\w* large out \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* narrow \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* which hath \w no|strong="H3808"\w* foundation \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* rest \w of|strong="H8478"\w* thy \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w fatness|strong="H1880"\w*.

Thy \w cause|strong="H4941"\w* hath \w been|strong="H4390"\w* \w judged|strong="H4941"\w* \w as|strong="H4941"\w* that \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w cause|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* thou shalt recover.

\w Therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w anger|strong="H2534"\w* overcome thee \w to|strong="H3588"\w* oppress \w any|strong="H3588"\w* man: \w neither|strong="H0408"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H2534"\w* gifts \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* thee \w aside|strong="H5186"\w*.

Lay down thy greatness \w without|strong="H3808"\w* tribulation, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mighty \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*.

Prolong \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w that|strong="H5927"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w may|strong="H0408"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w them|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w Beware|strong="H8104"\w* thou \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* aside \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* thou hast begun \w to|strong="H0413"\w* follow \w after|strong="H5921"\w* misery.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w high|strong="H7682"\w* \w in|strong="H0410"\w* his \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, \w and|strong="H0410"\w* none \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w him|strong="H3384"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H0410"\w* lawgivers.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* search \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*? \w or|strong="H1870"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: Thou \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*?

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou knowest \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, concerning \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w sung|strong="H7891"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w see|strong="H2372"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* beholdeth \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w is|strong="H0410"\w* great, exceeding \w our|strong="H3045"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*: \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w is|strong="H0410"\w* inestimable.
\w He|strong="H3588"\w* lifteth up \w the|strong="H3588"\w* drops \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* poureth \w out|strong="H4325"\w* showers like floods:
\w Which|strong="H0834"\w* \w flow|strong="H5140"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* cover all \w above|strong="H5921"\w*.
\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0637"\w* spread out \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* \w as|strong="H5645"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* tent,

\w And|strong="H3220"\w* lighten \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* shall \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* also \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ends \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w these|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* judgeth \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and giveth \w food|strong="H0400"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* many mortals.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hideth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* commandeth \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* come again.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* sheweth \w his|strong="H5921"\w* friend \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* is \w his|strong="H5921"\w* possession, \w and|strong="H4735"\w* \w that|strong="H5927"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* may \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.
